channel.title: [317] client help, all i got is .class files, i want my .java files back too
channel.description: well i got a client, and all there is .class files, how do i get my .java files back? need help.

item.title: [317] client help, all i got is .class files, i want my .java files back too
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:2, topic:333497”]if you deleted them yourself, just go to the recycle bin and find the .java files and restore them.

if you downloaded a client without them, they were deleted so people couldnt edit their client.
you can use a decompiler but most of the time it wont decompile your files completely and youll have to fix some things ;)[/quote]
DJ Java Decompiler or w/e works best GL

Read full topic
item.source: [317] client help, all i got is .class files, i want my .java files back too

item.title: [317] client help, all i got is .class files, i want my .java files back too
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

if you deleted them yourself, just go to the recycle bin and find the .java files and restore them.

if you downloaded a client without them, they were deleted so people couldnt edit their client.
you can use a decompiler but most of the time it wont decompile your files completely and youll have to fix some things

Read full topic
